data.message:
im an abomination
a real idiot
Im no better
they talk about 
how Good they are
cuase they can
i dont have the curtisy
carrying the sins
of the past
hope was fisrt
potensial was last
i am average
using gold
using beauty
using elements
to show authority
boosting mentalities
to feel good
 about themselves
i can say all i want 
but will never get the bigger picture
becuase they are smarter
there was a time when i expected great things
he took away my confidence

it is real but not the whole truth
the world would rather study the works of sychopaths
and how there mind worked
to predict and look for similarities
to identify future crooks

i am 

it just how it works
you cant get past that
 they talk about fast cars
beautiful woman
big houses
and what they have accomplished
feeling proud

in my life 
i lied
i stole
i fantacised about woman
dreamed about violence
and a lot of foul things
my actions speak louder
making bigger chemical reactions
which makes the consequence even harder
right now
im ignoring
and is just ignorant

fuck off
thats my reality
the streets
thats where i'll be
my touch will become infectious
my breath will make you nuacious
my appearance will give you nightmares
i will become dirty
and a foul mess
i'Ll stink
and keep you at a distance

I am just
an Aeron Boy
its here and now
i see some voids

gimme some OOze
i need a boost
to be Rude
and be the fool
to show attitude
to uplift the mood
to show you 
how thankfull
you should be
for the Will of God
